attributes.action: If Jeremy Corbyn wins, all rebel labour MPs should resign and by-elections held.
attributes.background: Labour MP's want to oust Jermey Corbyn who was democratically elected by majority of labour members. By not recognising him as a leader they have put at risk the institution of democracy and will of the masses. These MP's should resign immediately and contest the by-elections to prove their support.

rejection.details: The resignation of a Member of Parliament is a matter for the individual concerned, not the Government or Parliament as a whole.
